data.title: These 10 Texas Cities are Home to the Most Cheating Spouses
meta_keywords: my dating advisor most unfaithful cities in america
data.text:
Congratulations Texas, you've slept your way to the top.

According to a dating advice site, residents of the Lone Star State are the least faithful in all of the U.S of A. And three Texas cities in particular

Using data from the U.S. Census Bureau as well as the volume of searches on Google for affair hookup websites, My Dating Advisor calculated the “Infidelity Index” for 200 major U.S. cities and Texas cities took the top three spots.

The online report determined that the majority of those looking for sex outside their marriage live in Dallas, Fort Worth, and Houston. Those cities were not just tops in the state, they were the most unfaithful in America.

Conversely, two Texas border cities were among the 10 Most Faithful Cities in the nation. Laredo was ranked the 5th most faithful, and McAllen was #9.

The 10 Most Unfaithful Cities in Texas

#10 Garland – Overall Rank: 79

#9 Henderson – Overall Rank: 67

#8 San Antonio – Overall Rank: 65

#7 Grand Prairie – Overall Rank: 54

#6 Arlington – Overall Rank: 45

#5 Austin – Overall Rank: 44

#4 Plano – Overall Rank: 26

#3 Houston – Overall Rank: 3

#2 Fort Worth – Overall Rank: 2

#1 Dallas – Overall Rank: 1

Other Texas Cities in the Top 200

• El Paso #103

• Amarillo #105

• Waco #116

• Irving #119

• Frisco #133

• Killeen #137

• Brownsville #160

• Lubbock #162

• Corpus Christi #163

• McAllen #192

• Laredo #196

26 Celebrities Who Were Caught Cheating
